title: Cratoon
author: Cratoon
content: Hey BitcoinTalk Community! Take part in the great Friday the 13th Regatta wagering contest at Paradice crypto casino with 1 BTCTC prize fund.Start — 13th of May 2022, 7:00 UTC.Finish — 20th of May 2022, 7:00 UTC.How to win?1. Sign up or sign inNew players are welcome to get a 100 PRDC bonus to train your gambling skills at Paradice.2. Play your favorite games3. Climb to the top of the leaderboardThe more you wager, the higher you are on the leaderboard of the competition. The top 10 players will get their reward, 1 BTCTC total.
